2022

launched this homepage at github pages with eleventy and nunjucks

helped to add dark mode at awdee

concepted mobile application for food tracker

started to redesign brand vmeste and mobile applications. i helped to build process with inhouse team and agency

2021

helped kirill oleinychenko to update website awdee

started creating design-system for vmeste with vlad garbovsky. we began to research other systems and create components library in figma

2020

graduated from design school at bureau gorbunova

graduation thesis at a bureau: launched digest awdee in three weeks with the small team. this is an e-mail newsletters web archive for designers. lately digest moved to zhurnalus at artlebedev studio

2019

became a lead designer for a small team at vmeste. organized workflow processes

2018

tried to restart memento.ly with a new model reminder, voice messenger. prototyped ios-application. the project has been closed

helped to build new website venture engineering lab

2017

started to work at vmeste (service similar to nextdoor), prototyped ecosystem for 3 platforms: web, ios and android

worked at uxman agency. designed user interface, drew illustration and icons for others projects

2016

worked with mintsapp team. we prototyped site builder, email builder, and landings for other applications

2015

prototyped web and ios-application memento.ly for reminder calls

tried to restart gameslooper with the new engine. unfortunately, the project has been closed

2014

helped with the design at gameslooper, prototyped website loop disk for console games. prototyped web interface and drew illustrations with icons

created account at dribbble

2012

started as a freelance designer
